jd: From: Yashwant Singh, DMS Visions Inc yashwant@dmsvisions.com Reply to: yashwant@dmsvisions.com Hi,Hope you are doing well,Please find the job description given below and let me know your interest. Position: Senior Cloud Infrastructure Data Engineer Location: (100% Remote) Duration: 6+ months Job Description:MUST HAVES: 6+ yrs platform data development exp. w/RDS (PostgreSQL), Debezium. Redis, Kafka, Flink, DatabricksExtensive exp. w/AWS data services, including RDS Aurora, ElastiCache, Managed OpenSearch, S3, MSKWorking knowledge of Docker, Kubernetes, and EKS.Proficient with Terraform and one or more programming languages such as Python, Golang, or Ruby.Secured AWS Cluster.Set up data bricks.Skill Matrix - QUESTIONS THAT NEED TO BE ANSWERED BY CANDIDATE: Put either YES or No for candidate experience.. Next to each technology put the number of years the candidate has experience with each technology.6+ yrs platform data development exp. w/RDS (PostgreSQL), Debezium. Redis, Kafka, Flink, DatabricksWorking knowledge of Docker, Kubernetes, and EKS.Proficient with Terraform and one or more programming languages such as Python, Golang, or Ruby.Has the candidate configured and secured AWS Clusters?Has the candidate set up data bricks?JOB DESCRIPTION:We are seeking a Senior Cloud Infrastructure Engineer to join my client’s Runtime Platform Group. In this role, you will focus on building and managing our FedRAMP-authorized cloud infrastructure for U.S. Federal Government projects. As a Senior Cloud Infrastructure Engineer, you’ll work on a team that is developing a secure and compliant SaaS platform for federal government-led construction projects. This involves designing, deploying, and configuring cloud-native services and infrastructure in a dedicated environment that meets FedRAMP Moderate level controls. Your work will directly support my client’s strategic initiatives for 2024 and 2025. Join them and contribute to a mission-critical platform with wide-reaching impact!Responsibilities:Collaborate with internal teams and external stakeholders to design, deploy, and document cloud infrastructure resources for our SaaS platform in AWS GovCloud.Ensure compliance with FedRAMP Moderate level controls throughout the infrastructure deployment process.Use infrastructure-as-code tools like Terraform to automate the deployment and configuration of cloud databases, data lakes, and streaming systems.Deploy and manage technologies such as Debezium, Apache Flink, and Kafka in a secure, highly available environment.Engineer robust and resilient cloud systems that support 24/7 operations with 99.95% availability.Build and test disaster recovery systems to ensure infrastructure and data resiliency. Requirements:6+ years of experience with cloud infrastructure in a moderate-to-large-scale environment (>1000 hosts, petabytes of data).Extensive hands-on experience with AWS data services including RDS Aurora, ElastiCache, Managed OpenSearch, S3, and MSK.Proficient with cloud infrastructure tools such as Docker, Kubernetes, EKS, and Terraform.Experience with deploying and configuring data streaming tools (e.g., Kafka, Flink) and managing highly secure environments.Familiarity with cloud observability, logging, and monitoring tools.Strong programming skills in one or more common languages like Python, Golang, or Ruby.Experience working in an Agile development environment.Please share your updated resume and suggest the best number & time to connect with you Thanks & Regards,Yashwant SinghUS IT Recruiterdmsvisions.com/ E: Yashwant@Dmsvisions.comT: 972-645-5050 / 106A: 4645 Avon Lane, Suite 210, Frisco, TX 75033, Zip Code, Country
